channel.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
channel.description:
What I seemed to do when watching the call of duty black ops trailer was not really look at what they show you but what you want to see, and what I wanted wasn't on the trailer so I instantly disliked what I saw and lost belief in the game. But when I re-watched the trailer a few days later and actually looked a what the trailer was giving us I saw what a cool game it is actually going to be.
Common, wager matches like One in the Chamber, genius. So just go to their website and have a little look at the videos and observe whats actually going on with the game.
Tbh I liked what I saw so much I watched the videos over and over again.
http://www.callofduty.com/hub

item.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
item.dc:creator: @planbsk8erb planbsk8erb
item.description:
@planbsk8erb wrote:

if you read the title of the game you would know what time period it is set in. BLACK OPS. http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Black_ops . The whole game doesn’t take place in one time period. its about BLACK OPERATIONS. case closed.

Read full topic
item.source: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters

item.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
item.dc:creator: @rip4d rip4d
item.description:
@rip4d wrote:

sigh

The events in the game, the BLACK OPERATIONS, all took place between the Cold War and Present Day. So what if there was no real fighting in the cold war? This game isn’t based on a war, it’s based on the Black Operations, hence the name, Call of Duty: Black Ops.

Read full topic
item.source: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters

item.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

It’s called a cold war because not much shooting or killing was involved. A war like the iraq war would be a hot war. All the cold war was was building nukes and shit… idk the school system doesn’t want to teach us about Soviet Russia and their great accomplishments…

Read full topic
item.source: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters

item.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

rip4d:

Its Cold War - Modern Day.

Sorry, but you need to read context

All of the links provided have said its based during the era of the Cold War, meaning its all events leading to the Cold War, and then after. Cold War was not an actual war.

It talks above Vietnam war, Bay of Pigs invasion, and other various wars/invasions.

http://www.guardian.co.uk/technology/gamesblog/2010/may/28/call-of-duty-black-ops-preview

Set during the Cold War, CoD: Black Ops follows several covert operations groups, the secret units set up by the CIA to engage in deniable actions all over the world. Steeped in conspiracy theory and no doubt paying close heed to declassified government files, the game takes in the agency's anticommunist activities in Eastern Europe, in Vietnam and in Cuba. [b]Treyarch won't be drawn on specific dates,[/b] but I'm thinking things will focus on the sixties and seventies, from the Bay of Pigs invasion right through to 'Nam and maybe even Watergate. The missile crisis and Kennedy assassination must surely figure, too.

Read full topic

item.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
item.dc:creator: @Frell Frell
item.description:
@Frell wrote:

reyx7:

[quote=Wikipedia]Call of Duty: Black Ops[9] is a first-person shooter video game[5] developed by Treyarch and published by Activision to be released on November 9, 2010 for the Microsoft Windows operating systems, the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3,[4] Wii,[10] and Nintendo DS (separate version developed by n-Space)[1] consoles. Officially announced on April 30, 2010, the game is the seventh installment of the Call of Duty series and the third game in the series to be developed by Treyarch. It is a sequel to the developer’s previous title in the series, Call of Duty: World at War.[11] It is the first Call of Duty title set during the Cold War era.

http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Call_of_duty_black_ops
Suck it.[/quote]
Really, so in the cold war that had remote controlled RPG missiles?

CoD Black Ops will be made by Treyarch and take place in 2010 (shown in the teaser trailer) and will focus most of its gameplay based on flashbacks back to Cold War references such as the Vietnam War. It's going to be an epic game, my friend!
http://www.chacha.com/question/what-time-period-will-call-of-duty-black-ops-take-place

So im willing to bet its a modern war that was affected by battles in the past (which you play through to get the story).

Read full topic
item.source: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters

item.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
item.dc:creator: @reyx7 reyx7
item.description:
@reyx7 wrote:

Call of Duty: Black Ops[9] is a first-person shooter video game[5] developed by Treyarch and published by Activision to be released on November 9, 2010 for the Microsoft Windows operating systems, the Xbox 360, PlayStation 3,[4] Wii,[10] and Nintendo DS (separate version developed by n-Space)[1] consoles. Officially announced on April 30, 2010, the game is the seventh installment of the Call of Duty series and the third game in the series to be developed by Treyarch. It is a sequel to the developer's previous title in the series, Call of Duty: World at War.[11] It is the first Call of Duty title set during the Cold War era.
[url=http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Call_of_duty_black_ops]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Call_of_duty_black_ops[/url] Suck it.

Read full topic

item.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
item.dc:creator: @the_elve_age the elve age
item.description:
@the_elve_age wrote:

[quote=“reyx7, post:22, topic:360314”][quote author=the elve age link=topic=456746.msg3344159#msg3344159 date=1284682028]

Any news on the ‘zombie based’ game thing, or whatever the new thing’s gonna be? I hope the wager match thing isn’t what they had planned… although it does look awesome.

Agreed, I will end up getting it for this reason.

German Zombies will be epic.
[/quote]
This is the cold war dumbass… don’t you mean soviet zombies?[/quote]

DO YOU EVEN KNOW WHAT THE COLD WAR IS?

For one, its not even a war. Its US saying they have nukes, and USSR saying they have them also, and they both say they are going to blow each other up. It was both countries living in the fear of nuclear bombs. Its why its called the cold war.

[quote=“Frell, post:25, topic:360314”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=456746.msg3344201#msg3344201 date=1284685642]
Its the BLACK OPERATIONS dumbasses
[/quote]
Still based in modern day, not the cold war.[/quote][quote=“Frell, post:25, topic:360314”][quote author=rip4d link=topic=456746.msg3344201#msg3344201 date=1284685642]
Its the BLACK OPERATIONS dumbasses
[/quote]
Still based in modern day, not the cold war.[/quote]

Also, its called Black Ops, because its based on different periods of time, such as Korean war, ect.

Read full topic

item.title: Attention Call of Duty: Black Ops Haters
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

This game looks interesting but there’s one thing that is making me wonder if I should get it. The killstreaks. They sound even more retarded than MW2. For example, this new predator missile that can go in any direction sounds like it’s going to just make me shut off the game.

But oh well, I’m just one person and they aren’t going to remove the stupid features no matter what, so my opinion pretty much means nothing.

At least I still have Borderlands.

Read full topic
